thread.title: Sunday Punch: Niners QB isn’t only guilty party

author: Scott Ostler
title: Sunday Punch: Niners QB isn’t only guilty party
text:
Photo: Christian Petersen, Getty Images Colin Kaepernick is taking a lot of the heat for the 49ers’ dismal performance in their past two games, but might he be a victim — rather than the cause — of the team’s plummeting fortunes? Colin Kaepernick is taking a lot of the heat for the 49ers’...
The 49ers have announced that Party City is the team’s official party supply store.
